articles.title: Brexit: Next week’s London talks called off due to coronavirus
articles.description: Negotiators say they are looking for alternative ways to continue discussions
articles.content:
Planned talks between the European Union and United Kingdom to decide their post-Brexit relationship will not go ahead in London next week due to the coronavirus pandemic, the negotiators announced in a joint statement on Thursday.

articles.title: Coronavirus pandemic ‘could be over by June if countries mobilise’
articles.description: Comments from senior China medical adviser come as country claims peak of outbreak there has passed
articles.content:
